Rank-transform a matrix

Source: R/matrix.R
rank_transform.Rd

Rank the values within each row/col of a matrix, and output the rank values as a new matrix. Rank values are offset such that the rank of a 0 value is 0, and ties are handled by averaging ranks.

Usage

rank_transform(mat, axis)

Arguments

mat

Data matrix (IterableMatrix)

axis

Axis to rank values within. "col" to rank values within each column, and "row" to rank values within each row.

Details

Note that efficient rank calculation depends on the storage order of a matrix, so it may be necessary to call transpose_storage_order()
